personalInfo.name: Vishal Kumar
personalInfo.title: Web & Application Developer
personalInfo.bio: Results-driven Angular and Ionic Developer with 2.5 years of hands-on experience designing, developing, and deploying high-quality web and mobile applications. Expertise in Angular, Ionic, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase (including Cloud Functions), and RxJS. Proven ability to architect responsive UI/UX, implement scalable backend solutions, and integrate RESTful APIs. Strong problem-solver and collaborative team player committed to writing clean, maintainable code. Successfully delivered four end-to-end projects on schedule. Seeking to leverage technical proficiency and agile methodologies to drive innovation and excellence in dynamic development teams.

skills.description: Expert in Angular framework for building dynamic web applications

skills.description: Proficient in cross-platform mobile app development

skills.description: Strong typing and modern JavaScript features

experience.description: Leading frontend development initiatives and mentoring junior developers

experience.description: Developed user interfaces and enhanced user experience for web applications

Integrated RESTful APIs and managed application state

Reduced development time by 25% through reusable component library

projects.title: PartyTambola
projects.description: Interactive online tambola game platform with real-time multiplayer functionality
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive online tambola (bingo) platform that allows users to create and join games, with real-time synchronization and interactive gameplay features.
